page.title: 16ARTS, CRAFTS & ORGANISATIONS
page.content: There are quite a few {CLUBS} that contribute to the life of people in the block by providing{ARTS}and{CRAFTS activities. A few of these make music: The Geogian Handbells, The Avening Silver Band and the Tower Bell Ringers. In addition there is also: the W.I., Youth Club, Morris Dancing, Mothers Union, Good Companions, Toddler and Playgroup, Choir, Junior Church, "Keep Fit", Badminton, Friends of Avening School, Baby Sitting Circle and the Baptist Chapel Sunday School. Although some of these{ORGANISATIONS are outside our block people from inside it take part in them. The Georgian Ringers usually ring for pleasure. Mothers Union, Women's Institute and Friends of Avening School organize other activities as well. The Youth Club organizes trips and outings for young people.
